trigger_description: This trigger fires when TrickleStar Thermostat occupancy changes.
This trigger fires when TrickleStar Water Heater Controller detects a leak.
This trigger fires when TrickleStar Thermostat system mode or setpoint changes.

trigger: Thermostat room temperature is less than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your TrickleStar thermostat senses that the room temperature drops below the value you specified.

trigger: Thermostat room temperature is greater than
trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your TrickleStar thermostat senses that the room temperature rises above the value you specified.
